name: Camelina Suites
address: Carrer Valencia, 4, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Torrent Bay Club is just 100 metres from the beautiful Port des Torrent Beach and 5 km from San Antonio. It offers an outdoor pool for adults, an outdoor pool for children and bright air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony. Free WiFi is provided. The Torrent Bay apartments feature tiled floors and smart décor. Each one has a seating area with sofas and satellite TV, as well as a kitchenette with a microwave and coffee-maker. There is a large garden with loungers and a children’s playground. The complex also has table tennis facilities. There is a restaurant that serves snacks and breakfast daily. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Ibiza. You can also hire a car or bicycle on site. You will find other amazing beaches nearby. You can drive to Cala Bassa in 5 minutes and to Cala Tarida in 10 minutes. Ibiza Town is around 20 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Ibiza Sun Apartments
description: Located 200 metres from Playa d’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza Sun Apartments features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a hot tub and a bar. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Suites at Sun Ibiza have air conditioning and feature modern minimalist décor. There is a living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, and a kitchenette. Free WiFi is included. On site you will find SunThai restaurant, a chill out terrace with loungers and sunshades, and the Sun Wellness area. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange several activities. Sun Ibiza Apartments is close to Ushuaia and Ibiza’s most popular nightclubs and bars. Ibiza Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Invisa Hotel Club Cala Verde
address: Playa Des Figueral, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This new holiday resort complex is set just off Es Figueral beach, boasting fantastic views of the bay. It lies 25 km from Ibiza City. Take in the magnificent sea views from the hotel’s sun terrace, which surrounds the 2 outdoor swimming pools. Enjoy an active session playing tennis, 5-a-side football or volleyball before relaxing in front of the live entertainment with a meal from the hotel’s Mediterranean buffet restaurant.

name: Invisa Hotel Club Cala Blanca
address: Platja d' Es Figueral, Sant Carles de Peralta, Ibiza Island
description: This hotel is situated in the residential area of Playa d’Es Figueral, 10 km from Santa Eulalia del Río and in complete harmony with the landscape and the surrounding beach. A full late breakfast is served at the Marina Restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a bar as well as other on site facilities such as a fitness centre and a sun terrace. These spaces are ideal for family tourism. You can enjoy the magnificent beach here, the swimming pools and themed dinners. The little ones can enjoy their own swimming pool and other recreational activities.

name: Invisa Hotel Ereso
address: Playa De Es Cana 07 840 Santa Eulalia Del Rio Ibiza, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Location This hotel lies in the outskirts of Es Caná, only around 200 m from the beach. Ibiza Town is around 20 km. Scores of shops, restaurants, bars, pubs and excellent public transport links are situated in the hotel's immediate vicinity. Facilities The hotel features 240 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the hotel include a TV room and a playroom. Facilities include medical assistance. A bicycle hire service gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. All accommodation units offer a safe, a telephone and a TV. Each accommodation unit includes a bathroom with a shower. Sports/Entertainment The hotel features an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols are also available. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, handball, golf and archery. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with aqua aerobics and aquafit. Table tennis and pool/billiards are some of the sports and leisure options available at the hotel. Entertainment options and leisure facilities include an entertainment programme and an entertainment programme for adults. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: La Pandilla Ibiza
address: Carrer de Formentera 2-4, 07817 Sant Francesc de s'Estany
description: Set in Sant Francesc de s'Estany, 1.6 km from Es Cavallet Beach, La Pandilla Ibiza offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 1.8 km from Las Salinas Beach and 2.8 km from Es Codolar Beach, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features entertainment staff and free WiFi. At the hostel, every room includes a wardrobe. At La Pandilla Ibiza the rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available every morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at La Pandilla Ibiza, and the area is popular for fishing and snorkelling. Ibiza Port is 10 km from the hostel, while Marina Botafoch is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 3 km from La Pandilla Ibiza.
